text: Poistine, Allakh privodit lyudyam pritchi, chtoby uchit' ikh pravil'nomu povedeniyu, predstavlyaya malen'kikh i bol'shikh v Svoikh pritchakh. Allakh ne smushchayetsya privodit' pritchu pro kakogo- nibud' komara ili pro chto-libo boleye nichtozhnoye, pribegaya k allegorii, chtoby uchit' lyudey pravil'nym moral'nym i dukhovnym otnosheniyam. Te, kotoryye ne uverovali, kritikuyut takiye primery o malen'kikh sushchestvakh i vso bol'she uglublyayutsya v zabluzhdeniye. A te, kotoryye uverovali, znayut, chto pritcha, privedonnaya Allakhom- Tvortsom, - istina
